title: Crushed gem

properties.name: description
properties.value: A crushed gem is produced when a player fails to cut a semi-precious gems (opal, jade and red topaz). Players will gain a small amount of Crafting experience when a gem is crushed. The chance of obtaining crushed gems decreases with higher Crafting levels.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Crushed gemThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Crushed gem
Crushed gem
Released27 January 2003 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableYes
EquipableNo
StackableNo
NoteableYes
DestroyDrop
ExamineThis gem is crushed and broken.
Values
Value1 coin
High alch0 coins
Low alch0 coins
Weight0.003 kg
Advanced data
Item ID1633

A crushed gem is produced when a player fails to cut a semi-precious gems (opal, jade and red topaz). Players will gain a small amount of Crafting experience when a gem is crushed. The chance of obtaining crushed gems decreases with higher Crafting levels.

Crushed gems may be one of the items required in the Fairytale I - Growing Pains quest to make the magic secateurs.

The item is also tradeable but cannot be sold on the Grand Exchange.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
    • 1.1 Cutting Chance
  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 February 2015
(update)

The item was made untradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.

9 July 2007
(update)

The item's value was decreased from 2,000 to 1.

3 July 2007
(update)
  • The item was graphically updated.
  • The item was renamed from "Crushed gemstone" to "Crushed gem".
  • The item's value was increased from 2 to 2,000.
Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem or crushed gemstone).
